info.name: MobiPlay Driver API Collection
info.description: Complete API documentation for MobiPlay Driver App - Location-based Ad Serving Platform

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Authenticate driver and receive Bearer token for subsequent API calls.

**Request Body:**
- `email` (string, required): Driver's email address
- `password` (string, required): Driver's password (min 6 characters)

**Response:**
- `success` (boolean): Operation status
- `message` (string): Response message
- `data.driver` (object): Driver information
- `data.token` (string): Bearer token for authentication

**Test Credentials:**
- Email: testdriver@example.com
- Password: password123

Logout driver and revoke the current authentication token.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`

**Response:**
- `success` (boolean): Operation status
- `message` (string): Logout confirmation

item.description: Driver authentication endpoints for login/logout functionality

request.description:
Retrieve complete driver profile information including location and earnings.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`

**Response Data:**
- `id` (integer): Driver ID
- `name` (string): Driver name
- `email` (string): Driver email
- `phone` (string): Phone number
- `license_number` (string): Driver's license number
- `vehicle_number` (string): Vehicle registration number
- `vehicle_type` (string): Type of vehicle
- `status` (string): Current status (online/offline/busy)
- `current_location` (object): GPS coordinates and last update
- `earnings` (object): Total and unpaid earnings

item.name: Ad Serving System

request.description:
Request ads based on driver's current GPS location using smart targeting algorithm.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`

**Request Body:**
- `latitude` (number, required): Driver's current latitude (-90 to 90)
- `longitude` (number, required): Driver's current longitude (-180 to 180)

**Algorithm Features:**
- Geographic radius-based filtering
- Package priority sorting
- Anti-spam filtering
- Budget availability checking
- Distance calculations using Haversine formula

**Response Data:**
- `ads` (array): Array of formatted ads for display
- `total_available` (integer): Total ads available in location
- `location` (object): Confirmed driver location

**Ad Object Structure:**
- `id` (integer): Ad ID for impression tracking
- `campaign_name` (string): Campaign name
- `media` (object): Image/video URL and type
- `qr_code` (object): QR code URL, position, and redirect URL
- `location` (object): Ad location and radius
- `display_duration` (integer): Recommended display time in seconds
- `package_priority` (integer): Priority level for sorting

response.name: Ads Found Response
No Ads Available

request.description:
Record an ad impression (display or QR scan) and calculate driver earnings.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`

**URL Parameters:**
- `ad` (integer): ID of the ad being tracked (from ads/request response)

**Request Body:**
- `type` (string, required): Impression type - either "display" or "qr_scan"

**Impression Types:**
- `display`: Ad was shown on screen (lower payout rate)
- `qr_scan`: User scanned QR code (higher payout rate)

**Response Data:**
- `earnings` (object): Detailed earnings information
- `ad_id` (integer): Confirmed ad ID
- `type` (string): Confirmed impression type

**Earnings Calculation:**
- Different rates for display vs QR scan impressions
- Rates defined in package configuration
- Automatic driver earnings update
- Budget deduction from advertiser account

item.description: Location-based ad serving and impression tracking system

item.name: Driver Earnings

request.description:
Get comprehensive earnings summary with time-based breakdowns and statistics.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`

**Response Data:**
- `earnings` (object): Financial summary
  - `total_earnings`: All-time earnings
  - `unpaid_amount`: Pending payout amount
  - `today`: Today's earnings
  - `this_week`: Current week earnings
  - `this_month`: Current month earnings
- `statistics` (object): Performance metrics
  - `total_impressions`: Total ad views
  - `qr_scans`: Total QR code scans

**Use Cases:**
- Dashboard summary display
- Performance tracking
- Payout calculations
- Driver motivation metrics

item.description: Driver earnings and payout management endpoints

item.name: Location Management

request.description:
Update driver's current location with enhanced GPS data for real-time tracking.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`
- `Content-Type: application/json`

**Request Body:**
- `latitude` (number, required): GPS latitude (-90 to 90)
- `longitude` (number, required): GPS longitude (-180 to 180)
- `accuracy` (number, optional): GPS accuracy in meters
- `speed` (number, optional): Current speed in km/h
- `heading` (number, optional): Direction heading (0-359 degrees)

**Response:**
- `location` (object): Updated location data
- `analytics` (object): Movement analytics if available

**Use Cases:**
- Real-time driver tracking
- Movement analytics
- Route optimization
- Performance monitoring

Retrieve driver's location history with filtering options.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`

**Query Parameters:**
- `limit` (integer, optional): Records to return (1-100, default: 50)
- `date_from` (date, optional): Start date filter (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `date_to` (date, optional): End date filter (YYYY-MM-DD)

**Response:**
- `locations` (array): Location history records
  - Each record contains GPS data, timestamps, and context
- `total_locations` (integer): Number of records returned
- `period` (object): Filter period used

**Use Cases:**
- Route tracking and analysis
- Performance review
- Historical movement patterns
- Compliance and monitoring

request.description:
Get comprehensive movement analytics and driving statistics.

**Headers Required:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}`

**Query Parameters:**
- `period` (string, optional): Time period (today, week, month, custom)
- `date_from` (date, required if custom): Custom start date
- `date_to` (date, required if custom): Custom end date

  - `average_speed`: Average driving speed
  - `active_time`: Total active driving time
  - `location_updates`: Number of location updates
  - `suspicious_activities`: Any flagged movements

**Use Cases:**
- Performance dashboards
- Driver behavior analysis
- Efficiency metrics
- Safety monitoring

item.name: QR Code Tracking

request.description:
QR code redirect endpoint with automatic scan tracking.

**URL Parameters:**
- `qr_code` (string): Base64 encoded QR data containing ad ID and original URL

**Functionality:**
- Decodes QR code data
- Identifies the source ad and displaying driver
- Records QR scan impression automatically
- Calculates driver earnings for the scan
- Returns original URL for redirection

**QR Code Format:**
- Data: `{ad_id}|{original_url}`
- Encoded: Base64 encoding of the data
- Example: Ad ID 1 + URL "https://restaurant.example.com/menu"

**Response:**
- `success` (boolean): Operation status
- `message` (string): Tracking confirmation
- `redirect_url` (string): Original destination URL

**Use in Flutter:**
1. Display QR code from ads/request response
2. User scans QR code
3. App opens this URL to track the scan
4. App redirects to the final destination
5. Driver automatically earns money for the scan
